General.Name: Kangmei Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Kangmei Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. produces and sells Chinese herbal medicines in China. It also offers chemical medicines and health food; and operates hospitals and pharmacies. Kangmei Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: East side of Jieshen Road, Puning, China, 515300

4.Name: Mr. Yunfeng  Zhou
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. to the Board
